page.title: 10 A DAY IN THE LIFE OF..A.M.
page.content:
Charlotte Barnes.Age 11. Class 1. Saltwood Primary School.1985.
It's Monday morning and I wake up at about half past seven.My sister is in the bathroom and I have to wait.When I have finished I get dressed in my school uniform and go down for breakfast.It's about 8.o'clock and I usually have a cup of tea and maybe some cereal. I usually see my teacher driving into the school.I wait at the door of the classroom until the whistle goes at 8.55.When we go in we have Maths.At 10.10. we have Assembly and then play(10.30-10.50). As it's Monday we have P.E. in the hall until lunch time at 12. o'clock.After lunch we can play on the field until 1.15.when lessons start again.
